title: Blended Learning-Based Statistics Education Course for Practitioners (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics knowledge and data analysis experience
context.additional_context: Course for practicing elementary school teachers to cultivate statistical thinking applicable to real-world classroom scenarios, emphasizing hands-on practice using real educational data in simulation/VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners calculate and interpret descriptive statistics (mean, standard deviation, etc.) using real educational field data
Learners design and execute educational effectiveness analysis scenarios by applying hypothesis testing procedures
Learners write a 5-page report connecting statistical inference results to educational policies in VR simulation environments

resources: Merrill's First Principles of Instruction-based learning module

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
